scripts.android:device: react-native run-android --deviceId=$(adb devices | grep -w 'device' | grep -v 'List' | awk '{print $1}' | head -1)
scripts.android:physical: adb devices | grep -w 'device' | grep -v 'emulator' | awk '{print $1}' | head -1 | xargs -I {} react-native run-android --deviceId={}
scripts.ios:sim:current: react-native run-ios --simulator="$(xcrun simctl list devices | grep Booted | head -1 | sed 's/.*(//' | sed 's/).*//')"
scripts.ios:device:auto: npx react-native run-ios --udid $(xcrun xctrace list devices 2>/dev/null | grep '^iPhone (' | grep -v Simulator | grep -v Unavailable | head -1 | sed -E 's/.*\(([0-9A-F-]+)\).*/\1/')
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && rm -rf build/ && xcodebuild clean && cd ..
scripts.reset:ios: yarn clean:ios && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.reset:cache: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf /tmp/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn cache clean
scripts.reset:all: yarn reset:watchman && yarn reset:cache && yarn install && yarn pod && yarn reset:android && yarn reset:ios
